price: Na Sisi ndio tunao huisha na tunao fisha. Na Sisi ndio Warithi.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ
footnotes: Na ni Sisi tu peke yetu ndio tunavipa vitu vyote uhai, kisha tunavipelekea mauti, kwani uumbaji wote ni wetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lanaḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wanaḥnu al-wārithūna
